MTO.title: MTO (Mineral Turpentine Oil)
MTO.description: Mumbai, the financial hub of India, is also a major industrial zone with sectors like paint, printing inks, chemicals, textiles, and engineering relying on MTO for thinning, cleaning, and degreasing. As a trusted MTO Supplier in Mumbai, we deliver high-purity, low-odor, high-efficiency Mineral Turpentine Oil (MTO) to industries at volume—aligning both with health benchmarks and large-scale industries who value reliable and safe supply.
MTO.usesdescription:
• Printing Ink Industries – for ink formulation and cleaning of the machinery
• Chemical Processing Units – base solvent for intermediates and formulations
• Surface Coating and Metal Fabrication – for degreasing, cleaning, and painting prep
• Engineering Workshops – for mechanical cleaning, surface treatment, and parts prep
areanames: Vasai-Virar Belt and New Coastal Industrial MTO zones
Lower Parel, South and Eastern Suburbs

BaseOil.title: Base Oil
BaseOil.description: Base oils are the essential components used in the formulation of lubricants and greases. They serve as the foundation for various industrial applications including automotive, manufacturing, and chemical processing. Our Base Oil is sourced from trusted refineries ensuring high purity, superior lubrication properties, and environmental compliance.
BaseOil.usesdescription:
• Lubricant manufacturing for automotive and industrial applications
• Chemical manufacturing and processing
• Hydraulic fluids
• Metalworking fluids
• Marine and aviation lubricants
areanames: Vasai-Virar Belt and New Coastal Industrial zones
Lower Parel, South and Eastern Suburbs
